definitions.definition: ( archaic or historical ) Now chiefly as the second element in the names of plants : a plant used for food or medicine .
( specifically , historical ) Chiefly in the plural : a plant of the genus Brassica used as a vegetable ; a brassica ; especially, a cabbage ( Brassica oleracea ).
( by extension , botany ) A non-vascular plant growing on land from the division Anthocerotophyta (the hornworts ) or Marchantiophyta ( liverworts ); an anthocerotophyte or marchantiophyte .

main_definition: ( archaic or historical ) Now chiefly as the second element in the names of plants : a plant used for food or medicine .
secondary_definitions: ( specifically , historical ) Chiefly in the plural : a plant of the genus Brassica used as a vegetable ; a brassica ; especially, a cabbage ( Brassica oleracea ).
( by extension , botany ) A non-vascular plant growing on land from the division Anthocerotophyta (the hornworts ) or Marchantiophyta ( liverworts ); an anthocerotophyte or marchantiophyte .

definitions.definition: Also worts : a liquid extracted from mash ( ground malt or some other grain soaked in hot water ), which is then fermented to make beer , or fermented and distilled to make a malt liquor such as whisky .

main_definition: ( brewing , distilling ) Also worts : a liquid extracted from mash ( ground malt or some other grain soaked in hot water ), which is then fermented to make beer , or fermented and distilled to make a malt liquor such as whisky .
